actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to remove the ten year delimiting period on educational assistance provided to war orphans and widows.

summary.text: Removes the ten-year delimiting period on educational assistance provided by the Veterans' Administration to the widows of persons who died of service-connected disabilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to remove the ten year delimiting period on educational assistance provided to war orphans and widows.
